title: Formative Assessment-Based Blended Learning Evaluation Framework Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners are provided with digital devices to participate in online activities. They have some practical experience in elementary math education but lack systematic assessment design experience.

learning_goals: Explain methods for diagnosing learners using formative assessment tools in blended learning environments
Design LMS-based assessment activities to measure learners' process-oriented growth
Analyze formative assessment data to propose strategies for improving educational effectiveness
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
